Very addictive and fun! I have been playing this game for a few hours and I think it has been worth my money. The matchmaking is very bad and it takes forever to find a game, but when you do, it is usually an intense and great experience. I have encountered a few bugs which affected gameplay and a lot of game crashes. The game is very tense and it offers a great skill-tree system in which you can upgrade your survivors and killers. I really recommend this game!

Very good game! The developers try to support it, upgrade it and fix all the issues of the game every month.

Leider muss ich dem Game eine absage erteilen. Was am Anfang noch nach viel Spaß aussah ist in Wirklichkeit eine oft langweilige jagt nach "pro"-survivern gegen die man null Chancen hat. Allein schon die Auswahl der Spieler ist so unausgeglichen das es keinen Spaß macht. Ich habe etwa 3h Spielzeit auf dem "Ghost" Killer und werde nur mit high end survivern die mit den absolut besten Perks ausgestattet sind. Ich selbst habe noch fast garnichts.... solch ein Balance ist beschämend. Da sollte dringend was dran gemacht werden!

Wer überlegt das Game zu kaufen und nicht jeden Tag 5h+ damit verbringt sollte überlegen ob er die Kohle investiert, da hier "training" und durchhalten bis zu den besseren Perks das A. & O. sind...

Everytime you finish a game you need to reinvite friends and sometimes when you find a match it kicks you back to the main menu.

A game full of fun and fear. The maps are excellent. The killers are great except for The Hag. I do not like The Hag, I even hate it. Because if you are playing against him, you have no chance against him. If you approach the side of the triangle you have drawn around, you get a copy of itself from within the triangle and chase you. There are more than one copy of a triangle in the background. This is ridiculous. I really hated this killer.

好久没有回来完这款游戏了，今天回来看了看，感觉变化不是很大，估计是在地段为的原因吧，还记得当年因为这款游戏认识了一堆小伙伴，度过了多少个不眠之夜。。。现在想起来真是感觉时光荏苒啊。。。当年因为改版，原本的乐趣找不回来了，现在只能希望这款游戏能够更加完美把，或许有一天，我们这群曾经的“人皇”能够重新聚在一起，在20段一起伏地魔，爆米花，掌控雷电吧。。。。。

Dead by Daylight es un juego muy bueno, su idea es bastante buena y si te puede a llegar a ponerte demasiado tenso, pero sus bugs que arruinan la experiencia del jugador como no poder contonearte, algunos fallos en las animaciones, matchmaking, etc..., su gente toxica, si miras los foros hay puras discusiones de nerfear o buffear a una perk a un bando en general, los campers, hackers, rage quiters, asesinos que laguean intencionalmente, etc..., pero es bastante adictivo.
这款游戏非常好玩，非常刺激
游戏还是可以的   比较推荐

Здравствуйте, Dead by Daylight хорошая игрушка но есть в неё как плюсы так и минусы. Игра динамичная и командная, каждый игрок вносит большой вклад если у вас слаженная команда. Но даже одному можно выиграть и иногда даже проще чем выжить командой если вам попались игроки улитки)) Играть в неё можно одному - но с друзьями интереснее и если вам попадется умелый игрок, хорошо играющий за маньяка то выжить очень сложно. Минус тут один игра подлагивает, но разработчики в последнее время движутся в этом направлении, игра обновляется регулярно. В общем игра хорошая и не заброшенная, разработчики усердно её допиливают поиграть стоит а в компании друзей очень весело ))
确实好玩，但是版本更新越来越偏向屠夫 这叫人类好难玩

Určitě bych tuto hru doporučil.Po čase se stane možná trochu repetetivní ale čím délé ji budete hrát tím víc vás bude bavit.
Klady a Zápory:
+Originální koncept 4v1
+Hodně rozmanitých perků
+v akci za 13E
+Mnoho různých "skinů"
+Velký výběr surviorů a killerů
-Bugy
-Peer to Peer(Killer je Host)
-Vcelku drahá DLC k ceně hry
-Vývojáří neumí správně vybalancovat surviory a killery a jejich perky

Ale pokud vás zápory neodradily.Klidně bych hru doporučil.
Edit:just nominated this
Noice!

I tried my hardest to like this game, I really did.  I've purchased most of the DLC, I've gotten friends to buy it.  I've even gone to NYCC and met the developers- with this piddly little laptop and game DLC cards- and tried to engage with a talk with them about their game but only got a half-brave, pseudo-covering of "oh we have plenty of things in the works and lots of fixes" but in the end, there is only nothing.

This is a shell.  A shell of a game that COULD have been great with better marketing, and a more in-tune development team.  

The two I met at New York Comic Con had no idea what the hell was going on. One of them seemed more concerned with his cell phone than actually trying to talk about the game they were there to I assumedly promote.

Had this game had the features it had NOW when it first release, I might even be willing to recant my rennouncing of this game.  But- and with all seriousness it grieves me to do so- I must deny the thought of purchasing this game.  They've introduced some content to be sure, and I would have been one of the first to stand up, and with righteous indignation RENOUNCE any sort of nay-saying this game might of received.

But it's been a while.  I've got well over a day's worth of in-game time.  This isn't what we wanted people.  What we have is a broken, flawed shell of what COULD have been great, and at one point WAS...tolerable.

Now, you have insane queue times even during peak hours.  Hackers running a dime a dozen, with bot controlled Killers that sit there and auto-attack so that survivors get free wins and points.

It hurts me to say "Avoid this game".  I wanted so very much for it's community to flourish and grow.  But sadly, that was not the case for Dead by Daylight.



Edit:  They've added and have changed a bunch of stuff for the better in recent months.  I've enjoyed myself. :D

В Dead by Daylight мне понравилась тематика, атмосфера, затягивающий геймплей. Это что-то новое среди игр такого же жанра. Можно почувствовать эту боль выживших, когда их вешают на крюк, и насладится этим зрелищем за маньяка, когда смог всех поймать.
Самыми главными минусами являются баги, проблемы  с поиском игр, лаги, нечестная игра за маньяка, но это конечно зависит от пользователя, который играет за маньяка.
Эта игра не стоит на месте. Постоянно проходят какие-то обновления, патчи. Это улучшает игру, делает её интереснее.
В какой-то момент игра надоедает, хочется чего-то другого. Но впоследствие мы всё равно возвращаемся в этот прекрасный, атмосферный мир DEAD BY DAYLIGHT
AWESOME GAME!

很好的一个游戏。不论你是抖s还是抖m应该都会喜欢。但一定要记住这是个游戏，是我们玩他，不是他玩我们。别去买什么外挂，这样不仅浪费时间，还费钱，还体会不到游戏的乐趣。互相友好点，分够了，萌新三蹲就放过吧，离别刀也别忘了。玩游戏注意心态。很期待雷电法王杨永信，希望是真的。

Changing My review.

I was wrong in stating they are improving gameplay. They only pretend to do so. There are lingering issues, bias and bugs which have been part of the game for so long now that the playerbase has given up and begin to believe this mess is the best they can offer. After giving 4 years to this game, I regret being part of it.

Ethan (Almo), you are a garbage of a game developer. Please resign.

Original Review:

"I didn't enjoyed any game in whole 2016 as much as I enjoyed this one. 

Dead By Daylight is the perfect interactive tool for whoever grew with slasher movies like Halloween, Friday the 13th and such slasher movies. We all have pretended to be characters of those movies in our childhood games. With a well constructed leveling system and rewarding gameplay style, this game hits the nostalgia button as hard as one can.

Only issue I have with this game is connectivity issue, I hope they improve their servers with same intensity they are improving gameplay."
Good game

Juego 8/10 muy entretenido, y más si juegas en equipo, mantiene la tensión de principio a fin en muchas partidas.

-El juego se nota que está siendo actualizado para gente que ya sabe jugar, el emparejamiento es horrible. Muy desbalanceado. Da igual que tengas 1 hora que te va a meter con gente que te va a cerrar el sorete hasta que sepas jugar bien.
-Enseguida se sabe cual es el asesino TOP del momento
-No actualizan bugs, solo meten contenido de pago (sobretodo skins)
